problem.p: Some problems may ask for a particular chemical equation. You can practice this technique by writing out the following reaction in the box below.

Some tips:
Only real element symbols are permitted.
Subscripts are entered with plain text.
Superscripts are indicated with a caret (^).
The reaction arrow (\(\longrightarrow\)) is indicated with "->". So, you can enter "H2SO4 -> H^+ + HSO4^-".
